Usage_Tips: Lightning version targets 3-6 sampling steps at CFG scale 2 and should also work only with DPM++ SDE Karras. Avoid going too far above 1024 in either direction for the 1st step.
Author: Lykon Diamond Creator Badge
ReMark: You can use the Turbo version (not Lightning) as a non-Turbo model with DPM++ 2M SDE Karras / Euler at cfg 6 and 20-40 steps. Here is a comparison I made with some of the best non-Turbo XL models (with regular settings and turbo settings): h66ttps://civitai.com/posts/1414848 I have no idea why anyone would prefer 40 steps over 8, but you have the option.
